title: The life and death of Doctor Faustus made into a farce by Mr. Mountford ; with the humours of Harlequin and Scaramouche, as they were several times acted ... at the Queens Theatre in Dorset Garden ...
author: Mountfort, William, 1664?-1692.
publisher: Printed and sold by E. Whitlock ...,
notes: About half this play is from Marlowe's Doctor Faustus--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
